about_the_game:
Welcome to Midnight Release, a VR experience centered around the art of giving pleasure to beautiful furry characters. 

Midnight Release is a furry VR game that allows users to interact with several different original characters in a rich, picturesque virtual world. Unlike other adult furry games, Midnight Release is scope-limited by design to ensure we can deliver the highest quality experience possible. Our game uses the latest version of Unreal Engine to ensure that our character models are beautiful, our environments are inviting, and players remain fully immersed in the task at hand.

Starting from Scratch:

New players will first encounter Alice Monroe, the in-game creator of the Midnight Release holosuite hotel. She will guide our new “Operators” through the basics of using her hard light technology. Beginning with a modest set of “holohands” and “holotoys” players will be introduced to characters of all shapes, sizes, species, genders, and orientations with the task of figuring out exactly what makes them tick. The ultimate goal of every Operator is to make sure their client finds their release before midnight strikes.

Getting into the Groove:

As our players continue to gain experience with each new encounter, they will unlock new tools and gain access to clients with even more varied preferences. While being an adult game by nature, there is a true puzzle element when it comes to learning exactly what your new client likes. Some will tell you, while others will keep their secrets close to their chest. Each new client will dynamically react to where you focus your attention and there isn’t a simple “one size fits all” solution to these puzzles. It’s the job of the Operator to use their hands, toys, and whatever else they may have at their disposal to pleasure their clients. While the places, and faces, may change over time, the ultimate goal of the Operator remains the same: Deliver the most pleasure they can in the shortest amount of time. 

A Quality Experience:

This game is feature rich with immersion at the forefront of our design philosophy. You won’t find scene-breaking menus, screen-hogging HUDs, or the inevitable crime scene that quickly materializes when you are allowed to grab and pose NPCs without help. We built Midnight Release to ensure that once our players slip into the role of the Operator, they remain there for the entire play session without interruption. Want to change your client's position? Simply pop open the small radial menu, highlight the desired position, and a set of holohands will seamlessly move your client for you. No grabbing or posing required. Tired of trying to perfectly line yourself up in other adult games? Us too, so we’ve fixed that! How about a one-handed play mode for a more in-depth experience? Got it covered. We’ve done our best to balance freedom to do as you like with our NPCs while also maintaining immersion with minor in-game limitations.

Not Another Sex Sandbox:

Midnight Release is not a “sexual sandbox” game where players have to do everything themselves to obtain some kind of experience. It’s also not a game where players will have to spend time wandering around a giant, empty map to find their chosen partner. With so many “sandbox” games currently on the market, we took a completely different approach. Our game has limits and goals that are designed, and built, from the ground up to immerse our Operators in the futuristic world of Alice Monroe and her holosuite hotel. While still allowing our players a great deal of freedom to explore the in-game environments, we have narrowed the focus of Midnight Release so there is less wasted time finding the right location, posing your partner just right, lining everything up, and then finally trying to interact with them and hoping that Rod-A finds Slot-B in a believable fashion.

If you’d like to experience a true furry VR adult game, rather than another do-it-yourself-and-hope-it-works sandbox, then please wishlist Midnight Release today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-14400F or AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
  • Graphics: Intel RTX 1080ti or AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Valve Index and Controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 14th Gen or AMD Ryzen 7 9700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel RTX3060 or AMD 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Valve Index and Controllers
